text: Dušan Petrović Šane (1914-1977) was a Yugoslav communist soldier and politician who served as President of the People's Assembly of the Socialist Republic of Serbia from 1963 to 1967. A Partisan officer from World War II, Petrović was also a Hero of Socialist Labour and a People's Hero of Yugoslavia. ==References== *Da Graca, John V. Heads of State and Government. MacMillan Press, 1985. title: Dušan Petrović Šane
